name: power-plant-pass
effect: Permits entry to the Kalos Power Plant.
short_effect: Permits entry to the Kalos Power Plant.

flavor_text_entries.x-y:
This pass serves as an ID card
for gaining access to the power
plant that lies along Route 13.
